latest_revision.comment: /* Welcome to the HeatSync Labs Wiki! */
latest_revision.text:
__NOTOC__ == Welcome to the HeatSync Labs Wiki! == [[HeatSync_Labs|HeatSync Labs]] is a nonprofit [[How_To_Hackerspace | hackerspace]] in Arizona. Our objective is to empower engineers, artists, and inventors to push the limits of technology beyond its intended use. This wiki is intended as a collaborative area to record the decisions and policies made by the organization, share ideas and plans, and serve as a virtual workspace for member [[Projects| projects]]. {| width="100%" style="background: transparent;" |class="MainPageLeft" width="50%" rowspan="2" valign="top" style="border: 1px solid #80e080; border-right-width: 3px; border-bottom-width: 3px; padding: .5em 1em; margin: 1em; background-color: #f0fff0;"|
Community Information
* [[New to HeatSync Labs?]] * [[Faq|FAQ]] * [[Events]] ** [[Hack Your Hackerspace]] * [[Rules|Rules and Guidelines]] ** [[Operational Policies]] * [https://groups.google.com/g/heatsynclabs/ Google Discussion group] for official proposals and formal announcements. * [http://bit.ly/hslslack Slack invite link] to post on specific channels for stations where appropriate. * [[Open Hours]]
Lab Resources
If there are not specifics on how to get started on a tool post on Slack in the relevant channel (or general) expressing interest and asking for help. *[[3D_Printers | 3D-Printing]] *[[Arts_and_Crafts | Arts and Crafts]] *[[AudioVisual | A/V Station]] *[[Bicycle Repair Station]] *[[Biochem_Lab | Biochem Lab]] *[[Electronics]] *[[Jewelry]] *[[Laser_Cutters | Laser Cutters]] ([[Laser_FAQ |FAQ]]) *[[Leather_Working | Leather Working]] *[[Library]] *[[Machine_Shop | Machine Shop]] *[[Screen_Printing | Screen Printing]] *[[Sewing]] *[[Vinyl Cutter]] *[[Welding]] *[[WoodShop | Wood Shop]] *[[Other Resources]]
